title: 8.5: Gateways to Romance - Interstitial
dc:creator: Jennifer Prokop
description: You’re new to romance, where should you begin?! This week, Jen and Sarah are talking about good gateway romances, and we’ve got four that we think work for readers who’ve never dipped a toe, but are open to things from dukes to magic, the America West to kinky London and everything in between.
itunes:author: Fated Mates
itunes:subtitle: Jen and Sarah search for the perfect gateway to romance
itunes:summary: You’re new to romance, where should you begin?!
